Row.Text: +25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City. Missionary units purchased in this city receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and do not receive a Sight penalty.

The Stoudion is the unique building for Theodora's Byzantium, replacing the Garden. The Stoudion increases the speed at which Great People are generated in this city as well as the [ICON_PEACE] Faith output of this city. Missionary units purchased in this city receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and do not receive a Sight penalty. The Stoudion does not require this city to be next to a River or Lake to be built.

The Monastery of Stoudios, more fully Monastery of Saint John the Forerunner "at Stoudios", often shortened to Stoudios, Studion, or Stoudion, was historically the most important monastery of Constantinople (modern-day Istanbul), the capital of the Byzantine Empire. The residents of the monastery were referred to as Stoudites (or Studites). Although the monastery has been derelict for half a millennium, the laws and customs of the Stoudion were taken as models by the monks of Mount Athos and of many other monasteries of the Orthodox world; even today they have influence.
